translations: 观察者；看守人；哨兵；（美）选举监票员

sentences.sentence: Then the watcher announced that the "Lindy Hop" was the name of the dance, and it has stuck since then.
sentences.translation: 接着，观察者宣布，这支舞的名字是“林迪舞”，并且从那以后就一直沿用了下来。

sentences.sentence: Observations that an amateur bird-watcher can make are really limitless.
sentences.translation: 业余观鸟者的观察力是无限的。

sentences.sentence: But observations that an amateur bird-watcher can make are really limitless.
sentences.translation: 但是一个业余观鸟者所能做的观察是无限的。
